result.title: Broad Outreach to stakeholders and the general public
result.description: Broad Outreach to stakeholders and the general public (M1-M48):-Press release targeted at the agricultural, commercial and public sectors, policy makers and academics (multiple at pivotal moments in the project (launch, demonstrations, policy briefs,…); M1 to M 48)- Digital project newsletters (multiple appearances ~ every 4 months) plus regular appearances in other newsletters: once per year in SCOPE, twice per year in BioRefine Bulletin, regular appearance in partner newsletters (twice at least in every partner newsletter, including those in local languages)… ( (M4-48)- 24 regional Workshops organized by the NTF (M12 to M42)- Country brochures in local languages (24 in total) (12 at M24 and 12 at M48)- 24 articles in specialized agro-press (local languages) (M48)Amendment justification: Extension of 12 months necessary due to COVID-19 related delay and limited activities
